title: Exclusive: Toyota's unexpected China E.V. plans
text:
Exclusive: Toyota's unexpected China E.V. plans 6:53am EDT - 02:06
Toyota is taking an unprecedented route to meet China's stringent green car quotas: its showrooms will sell an electric vehicle without the Japanese company's distinctive triple-oval logo. Instead, it will feature the label of GAC Motor, Toyota's Chinese partner, and will be built around GAC's lower-cost technology.
